bill_title: provide a process by which certain motor fuel taxes are refunded to tribal members.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide a process by which certain motor fuel taxes are refunded to tribal members. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any tribe with a tax collection agreement may request that the Department of Revenue and Regulation transmit any motor fuel tax refunds due its members pursuant to the decision in Pourier v. State of South Dakota (2004 SD 3) to the tribe for distribution to its members. If a tribe makes such a request, the department shall send to the tribe refunds based on the percentage split of motor fuel tax collections contained in the tax collection agreement in effect at the time the motor fuel purchases were made. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
